name: Harit Dheer
homeIntro2: Hi there! I'm a Full Stack Developer, AI Specialist, Frontend Developer, Software Engineer, Backend Developer, Cloud Architect, AWS Practitioner, and Researcher with a passion for creating innovative solutions to complex problems. I've honed my skills in both front-end and back-end development, and have worked with a range of technologies across various domains.
designation: ['Full Stack Developer','AI Specialist','Frontend Developer','Software Engineer','Backend Developer','Frontend Developer','Cloud Architect','AWS Practitioner','Researcher']
underDevelopmentAlert: This website is getting updated time to time.
aboutContent:
Hello! I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer, AI Specialist, and Software Engineer with experience across both frontend and backend technologies. I enjoy building scalable applications, designing intuitive user interfaces, and architecting robust backend systems.



My journey includes hands-on work as a Frontend Developer and Backend Developer, allowing me to deliver seamless and efficient digital experiences. I am also skilled in cloud technologies as a Cloud Architect and AWS Practitioner, ensuring applications are reliable and scalable.



As a Researcher, I stay updated with the latest trends in technology, especially in AI and cloud computing. My goal is to combine my diverse skills to create innovative solutions that solve real-world problems and drive progress in the digital landscape.
